title: School Idol Rangers: Assembled!!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Huh? What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I heard... you were making the School Idol Rangers...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>W-where did you...!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hmhm, Mari’s seen through your tricks... For Mari is... the Evil Captain Violet Shadow!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Violet Shadow!? I-I didn’t think we would meet in a place like this...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Shiny~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Shiny...? W-wait a second! That’s the catchphrase Shiny Violet had before she was captured by the enemy!! You’re not Violet Shadow... You’re our ally, Shiny Violet, aren’t you!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Oh? You’re taking this in that direction, aren’t you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes, yes!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Ugh... my head! Don’t you dare say those words in front of me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I’ll fight the brainwashing Violet Shadow put you under! Please take my hand, Shiny Violet!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Shiny~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Amazing! I was able to improvise too! I’ve gotta tell Shizuku-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>The School Idol Rangers seem pretty fun! Could I please join too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Of course, Mari-san! Let’s think of a cool introduction for Shiny Violet~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
